metadata.name: Color of Freedom
metadata.description:
Freedom is first formed in our mind

Then, with an enlightened mind, you can fly beyond freedom

A place where colors merge and all beings become a single form

A place where everything is aligned, one heart and equal, a place beyond any particular opinion and belief

So believe in freedom with an open mind, become one with the whole being and fly towards it


Digital Painting 4300 X 5400 Pixels
